attributes.action: ensure the police investigate and prosecute an MP found to have embezzled or fraudulantly obtained tax payers money in their expenses claim.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of so may MPs being 'found out' there is obviously an underlying currupt and dishonest group of MPs who are obtaining money fraudulantly in their expense claims. This has to be stopped immediately. Any MP who steals money from the electorate must be publicly punished

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
